name: event_id
description: Unique identifier for the analytics event.

name: trip_id
description: Trip identifier associated with the event.

name: user_id
description: User identifier that triggered the event.

name: created_at
description: Trip or event creation date used for table partitioning.

name: event_timestamp
description: Timestamp indicating when the event occurred.

name: app_platform
description: Platform emitting the event (android, web, wear_os).

name: country_code
description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code derived from locale or permissions.

name: metadata
description: Flexible key/value metadata for the event context.

fields.name: value
fields.description: Metadata value as a stringified payload.
